author: singh-ramanpreet
body:
#### PR description:

- This PR is a backport to 11_2_X release.
- The original PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/32418 is already merged to the master branch.

#### PR validation:

- passes basic tests
- need latest version of https://github.com/cms-data/RecoJets-JetProducers (`V05-13-00`) or for testing purposes, the PR can be used https://github.com/cms-data/RecoJets-JetProducers/pull/12

#### Re-miniAOD info

`_chsalgos_106X_UL17` is already the default.

From the discussion in 106X backport PR #32872, I have added below line, such that  `_chsalgos_106X_UL18` can be used with `run2_miniAOD_devel`. Please comment if that's not the case.

```diff
+ (run2_miniAOD_devel & (~run2_jme_2016) & (~run2_jme_2017)).toModify(pileupJetId, algos = _chsalgos_106X_UL18)
```

FYI: @alefisico @camclean @marinakolosova @mariadalfonso
title: PUID UL18 backport to 11_2_X
